1.content:
The Omnitrix (sometimes referred to as the Omnimatrix) is a watch-like device, created by a Galvan named Azmuth, that is a portable library of intergalactic genetic data which allows the wielder to alter their DNA at will and rapidly transform into a variety of different alien species, each with their own unique abilities. This version of the Omnitrix is the original prototype.

---

Purpose:

The Omnitrix was created by Azmuth as a tool of peace in an act of repentance following the destruction caused by his previous creation, Ascalon, a weapon of terrible power.

To the rest of the universe, the Omnitrix had a two-fold purpose. One was to promote inter-species understanding by allowing other beings to experience different ways of life. The other was to function as a repository for the DNA of over a million different species that Azmuth thought were intelligent. The samples were scanned, and when necessary, repaired. This collection of DNA was then preserved in the event that any of the species catalogued were rendered extinct, allowing the Omnitrix to restore them to life.

Unbeknownst to everyone else, Azmuth had a third reason for creating the Omnitrix. He hoped that his estranged lover Zennith, who had left him as he created Ascalon, would learn of his change and come back to him.

---

The Prototype Omnitrix's Appearance + Components:

Omni-Core: The cylindrical tower at the base of the Omnitrix and its most important piece, as it allows the device to function. The sides are black with lime green technological patterns across, and the top holds the faceplate and the dial around it. When the activation button is pressed, it springs up, and when pressed back in, it transforms the wielder into the selected alien species by bursting out a special energy called Omni-Energy (which is green when transforming and red when detransforming) that alters the user's DNA instantaneously.

Faceplate: The interface of the Omnitrix. It usually has a hourglass symbol the same colour as the Omni-Core, with a black outline on a grey background, but it, along with the colour, could change, depending on the mode the Omnitrix is on; in Active Mode when the Activation Button is pressed, the faceplate's hourglass symbol inverts into a four-sided diamond and shows the silhouette of the selected species; in Recharge Mode, the hourglass symbol is red in colour; in Capture Mode the hourglass symbol turns yellow and spins around for a couple of seconds; in Self Destruct Mode, the hourglass symbol is orange at the top and the bottom, which slowly change in small sections towards the centre of the symbol as the countdown gets lower and when it is completely orange, the Self Destruction of the Omnitrix starts; In Reconfiguration Mode the hourglass turns blue.

Dial: The control piece of the Omnitrix. It looks like a grey cylinder which is black at the top and has green bulbs at the top, bottom left and right held on grey bases. It allows the wielder to select between the different species within the Omnitrix, shown when the species silhouette on the faceplate changes into another by twisting it. It also has a faceplate screen that acts as a stabiliser for the transformations, because if it is removed, it could make the transformation into the selected species combine with another, making a fusion between two species at random.

Activation Button: The button that causes the Omnitrix's Omni-Core to spring up. It can be pressed again to cause the Omni-Core to retract back down without transforming the wielder. It is lime green in colour (red in Recharge Mode and Yellow in Capture Mode) on a grey base, located on the right-hand side of the Omnitrix's strap (left-hand side if the Omnitrix is equipped on the right wrist).

Tubes: The white tubes on the left and right of the Omnitrix's strap that almost invert close to the dial/Omni-Core. When in Capture Mode, it glows yellow.

Strap: The base of the Omnitrix. It is dark grey with a light grey structure around the left and right (parallel to the arm) with a black stripe at the centre that goes along the main dark grey piece and also outlines the Activation Button's base. The Strap is made out of an unknown material that is near-indestructible and can only be destroyed by the Omnitrix's own Self-Destruct Mode's explosion. At the top, it has a cylindrical connection port, which holds the Omni-Core in place; if the Omni-Core is removed (via removing it manually (only by people like Azmuth) or tampering with the device) from the strap, the Omnitrix can't function. It has a connector on each side of the Connection Port, which opens if the Omnitrix is unequipped and is Active.

Omnitrix Badge: The state of the Omnitrix when the wielder has transformed into the selected species, usually in the shape of a grey badge with the Omnitrix faceplate at the centre and the hourglass symbol is white. When the Omnitrix's usage time is fully depleted, the hourglass symbol begins to flash between red and white while emitting five repeated **BEEP!!!** sounds, each decreasing in pitch. On the fifth beep, the hourglass turns red and after two seconds, red Omni-Energy bursts out and rapidly turns the wielder back to normal, change the badge into its normal watch state of the wielder's arm and the Omnitrix enters Recharge Mode.

---

Alien selection

When the user gets the Prototype Omnitrix initially, they start off with these 10 alien species to choose from:

1. Heatblast: The powers of pyrokinesis

2. Wildmutt: The powers of advanced scent 

3. Diamondhead: The powers of crystalkinesis

4. XLR8: The power of speed

5. Grey Matter: The power of smarts

6. Four Arms: The power of pure strength

7: Stinkfly: The power of flight

8: Ripjaws: The powers of swimming underwater

9: Upgrade: The power of upgrading technology

10: Ghostfreak: The powers of a ghost

The user can collect more than these 10 via collecting more DNA samples or unlocking them via inputting random codes by twisting the dial in different directions.

---
Modes:

Active Mode: Active Mode is the Omnitrix's default mode when idle. It is where the user can select the transformation they want to become; initiate the process of transforming; and stay in said transformation. The actual usage time is 10 minutes at a time. However, different factors and actions performed by the user can severely diminish the available usage time: most commonly if the user, while transformed, changes to another form. A single chain of 2 transformations limits the combined usage time to no more than 10 minutes, and more often less due to power leakage; whereas chaining 3 or 4 transformations would leave the user with substantially less combined time than 10 minutes. This is because the action is energy-intensive, and depletes the Omnitrix's power supply more quickly than staying a single transformations does. Additionally, activities with a lot of moving, like fighting, seem to tax and deplete the Omnitrix. However, if regular transformations are tampered with, the user can't always turn back.

Recharge Mode: When the Omnitrix's usage time is fully depleted (i.e. "times out"), it goes into Recharge Mode: firstly warning of the timing out; then detransforming the wielder and locking all functions of Active Mode while the Omnitrix recharges. Recharge Mode's main purpose is to prevent the alien DNA from attaching permanently to its host. The Omnitrix is capable of detecting when its host is in any sort of life-threatening distress. Specifically, it can instantly recharge to protect the user from a direct physical threat. If the wielder is knocked out or hurt enough, the Omnitrix will revert them to their normal form.

Capture Mode: When a new DNA sample has been unlocked from the Codon Stream, or when the Omnitrix captures new DNA not present in the Codon Stream, Collect Mode is activated. It can also reclaim lost or removed alien DNA that was in the Codon Stream.

Master Control Mode: Usually referred to as simply 'Master Control', it allows unlimited access to all of the Omnitrix's functions, like access to all alien forms in the device and also instant changes with no time limit unless all available power is used up. It can be unlocked via a special code by twisting the dial or by voice command by Azmuth by saying "Access Master Control."

---

Functions:

The Omnitrix mainly allowed for the user to transform into a numerous variety of alien life-forms, each with their own unique powers and abilities (along with their weaknesses) and in a selection of alien DNA that is in groups of 10.

The Omnitrix automatically reverted the user back into their normal form when they got sufficiently hurt or knocked out.

The Omnitrix acted as a wireless receiver for the Codon Stream.
By accessing the Codon Stream in a faster-than-light manner, the Omnitrix used special Omni-Energy to merge or bind its wearer's DNA with the alien DNA samples it held to create transformations, injecting them into the user's blood. The host's DNA is stored in the Omnitrix itself instead of the Codon Stream; this allows it to be accessed so it can change their DNA back to normal.

The Omnitrix had a quick-change feature. The user could change back by turning the second ring on the Omnitrix Badge to the 3 o'clock position. Manually touching the Omnitrix Badge not only allows the user to immediately transform back to normal but can also be used to change forms while already transformed.

The Omnitrix could alter its size to fit the user's wrist.

While transformed, the Omnitrix protected the user from negative effects, including:

* Being possessed by an Ectonurite.
* Exposure to the dangerous effects of Corrodium.
* Being transformed by DNA-Altering waves.

The Omnitrix had defence mechanisms to protect the host:

* The Omnitrix had a built-in energy feedback blast to defend against anyone trying to force it off of its owner.

* The Omnitrix was capable of monitoring the telemetry of the host's vitals. This allowed it to detect when the host was in danger and self-activate, even in recharge mode.

Once placed on a host, the Omnitrix utilises the host's DNA and melds with their skin at the genetic level, thereby making it impossible to remove by any normal physical means.

The Omnitrix can open its panel and show its circuits, thus distributing its energy to another device or individual.

The Omnitrix could show a database image of all aliens unlocked.

The Omnitrix could genetically manipulate DNA or reprogram a species' DNA (like fuse DNA from different species of aliens).

The Omnitrix has a scratch guard, which can be removed; if so, the Omnitrix Badge's hourglass symbol turns into the same colour as the device's core colour.

The Omnitrix changed the aliens' eye colour to match the device's core colour.

The Omnitrix could be synchronised with another Omnitrix, even without the user's intent.

The Omnitrix is waterproof, meaning it can function when submerged in water.

The Omnitrix could replace one of its DNA samples with someone else from the same species.

The Omnitrix was able to be set to prevent the user from returning to their base form. It can be reconfigured by putting the user into a transformational loop until it is deactivated.

The Omnitrix had the ability to redirect scans from inorganic aliens if the power was boosted, resulting in an orange rippling pulse to come out of the Omnitrix, sending anyone near it flying backwards.

The Omnitrix could create an alien species.

---

Extensions:

The Omnitrix has a built-in AI (Artificial Intelligence).

The Omnitrix can function as a GPS.

The Omnitrix had a 2-way communication system with Plumber Badges.

The Omnitrix had a built-in Universal Translator and could also translate other Earth languages; however, it couldn't translate animal languages.

The Omnitrix could teleport the user through Azmuth's teleportation channel.

The Omnitrix had a homing beacon that could guide the user to Xenon if it was ever in the planet's quadrant. Once within a close enough range of Xenon, the Omnitrix could fire a beam of green energy that negates the effects of the planet's light-absorbing device.

The Omnitrix is capable of creating a simulation within itself and transporting the user's mind, including mimicking the home worlds of its DNA samples and displays information on a holographic screen.

The Omnitrix can add extras to lifeforms to make them safer and more usable.

The Omnitrix can flag tampering attempts.

If necessary (such as the wielder's wrist where the Omnitrix is located being dismembered), the Omnitrix is capable of Muscular Puppeting.

The Omnitrix can levitate; this is shown when someone is in close proximity to the Omnitrix when it is not on someone's wrist.

---

EXTRAS:

Colour Coding:

The Omnitrix could display ten colours on the faceplate, each meaning something different:

Green: Active Mode
Red: Recharge Mode
Yellow: Collect/Capture Mode
Blue: Reconfiguration Mode
Purple: Controlled or risk of temporal threat
Orange: Self-Destruct Mode (original Omnitrix form)/Alien Creation (Reconfigured Omnitrix form)
Grey: Inactive Mode
Pink: Under spell effect


Display Modes:

The Prototype Omnitrix had two known display modes for the species: The default being black silhouettes on the faceplate or green holograms. By changing the settings, either could be chosen.

Clothing:

Upon transformation, the Omnitrix automatically used the molecules of its wearer's clothes to create coverings for the transformed user (however, this wouldn't be the case for species that don't need clothes). 

This function would most likely be lost when the Omnitrix is in its reconfigured variant; instead, nanomachines broke its wearer's clothes down and stored them until they detransform, where it'd be instantly re-equipped onto their body.

Omnitrix Badge allocation: 

In the original variant of the Prototype Omnitrix, the Omnitrix Badge was usually placed in different places on some transformations; however, in the reconfigured variant, they're always at the centre of the chest, which could be the result of a bug.

Voice Commands:

The Omnitrix could be controlled by voice (when the feature is active), called Voice Command. These include:

* Omnitrix Command Function Override: Overrides a function.

* Omnitrix Revert/Repair (Species name): Repairs genetic damage to a selected species.

* Omnitrix Voice Command Mode: Activates the voice command function.

* Access Master Control: Unlocks Master Control; this command only works for Azmuth's voice.

Decouple Omnitrix Command Code: 000 - Release Coupling - 0: Remove the Omnitrix from the wearer. If used while transformed, it'll start the detransformation process and release as the Omnitrix badge and then turn into the Omnitrix's watch form.

Omnitrix Self-Destruct in (time): Command code: 000 - Destruct - 0: Activates Self-Destruct Mode.

Codes:

The Omnitrix has thousands of code combinations for various purposes, such as:

* Unlocking DNA samples.

* Unlock functions, such as Master Control.

* How to also block functions.

---

Malfunctions:

The Omnitrix would sometimes transform the user into the wrong species; this, however, is fixed when the Omnitrix reconfigures, but could happen again if damaged by a hacking machine.

If the Omnitrix's dial is broken off, the result is DNA fusions when the user transforms due to the faceplate cover not being present.

The Omnitrix could be affected by electromagnetic waves, which could activate Self-Destruct mode.

When exposed to electromagnetic interference, the Omnitrix could cause unintentional transformations and would be unable to deactivate until the source of the interference is gone. This could work in reverse, rapidly changing the user from one form to another until someone/something stops it.

If the user gets sick, the Omnitrix makes the transformations sick, too.

If the user is transformed into a Splixson, they'll be incapable of detransforming if their clones are far from each other. If this occurs, the time for other transformations will be shorter, as they require a lot of energy from the Omnitrix.

If hacked by those who can travel in time, the Omnitrix will transform the user into a younger version of themself. It can also switch the user's mind with an older version of themselves.

Aliens, like Ectonurites, can escape the Omnitrix via sentience, but others could escape by hacking.

In addition to gaining all the powers and abilities of an alien, the user gains all the weaknesses of that alien as well. The user is also susceptible to certain behaviours inherent to the alien they're transformed into, such as a necrofriggian's reproductive nature.

Sometimes the Omnitrix would randomly leave the user stuck as an alien for an indefinite amount of time that could only be deactivated by certain electrical pulses or Azmuth hitting the Omnitrix Badge.

Some powerful items are capable of forcing the Omnitrix to enter Recharge Mode.

The Omnitrix has no mind control protection.

Non-stop transformations via the quick-change feature could overload the Omnitrix and cause it to malfunction.

The Omnitrix's user and its transformations were vulnerable to being de-aged.

If the user activates a beam to revert DNAliens back to the infected person's species, the Omnitrix's energy would deplete, and the user would get exhausted, turning the device into recharge mode.

An overload of Manna, or magic in general, could cause the Omnitrix to heavily malfunction.

If the Omnitrix is scratched, it will slowly transform the user, especially in Capture Mode.

If the Omnitrix is creating an alien species, it will not allow the user to transform.

When an alien species is finished being created by the Omnitrix, the hologram would remain in an orange and static-like state instead of green.

Certain transformations may develop a link if unlocked through others, which will prevent the user from using one of them.

The Omnitrix could be temporarily disrupted by the teleportation feedback.

The DNA sources of aliens can override the alien and take control of the user's mind, like an Ectonurite.

The Omnitrix can be hacked by Galvanic Mechamorphs. Also, the aliens can be eradicated from the Omnitrix by Mechamorph hacking.

Overusing the Omnitrix will permanently disfigure the user's DNA.

5.content:
Pyronites are an extraterrestrial species of plasma-based lifeforms from the star Pyros.

---

Appearance:

Pyronites are a humanoid plasma-based species that are composed of a bright inner plasma body covered by volcanic rocks. As fire-based entities, their bodies radiate high amounts of heat.

Their feet have a slight oval-like design with only two toes and one back toe, and have somewhat large hands with bridged wrists. Their tongues are coated with fire, while their collarbones resemble a volcano which generates a fiery hair-like aura that covers their head, leaving their mask-like face visible with no nose, ear structure or pupils.

Their voices are usually middle-pitched and slightly rough; the pitch, however, depends on their gender or age.

Infant Pyronites are much smaller and thinner, and child-aged Pyronites have oversized heads and higher voices.

Female Pyronites are basically the same as male Pyronites, except they have more curved figures, and their chests slightly jut outward. Their arms are thinner than a male's. Their faces are longer and more curved.

If a Pyronite is infected with the cold, its plasma turns blue.

When someone is transformed into a Pyronite (known as Heatblast) via the Omnitrix, the Omnitrix badge is at the centre of their chest. Since they're plasma-based and fiery in nature, they don't form a jumpsuit.

---

Diet:

Pyronites gain sustenance directly from the nuclear reactions of their homeworld.

---

Technology:

A few coats of Pyronite wax can make anything completely fireproof. Pyronite polish is known for its ability to withstand extreme temperatures.

---

Powers and Abilities:

Pyronites have the power of pyrokinesis, meaning that they can create and influence the direction and form of fire. They draw their strength directly from the nuclear reactions of their world. Pyronites can project streams of fire from their hands and mouth, and can create fireballs that they can throw or roll. They can also absorb both flames and heat, meaning that they can put out a fire just as quickly as they can start one. Additionally, Pyronites can enhance the power of their punches by coating their fists in fire, and can ignite their opponents or objects by touch or remotely.

A Pyronite's fire can burn hot enough to melt solid rock, a tank, and a road. Pyronites can also use their fire in more creative ways, such as welding clumps of objects together or making fireworks. Additionally, they can spark fire fuses by snapping their fingers.

Pyronites are capable of projecting fire lasers. Pyronites can also form large fireballs that function as bombs.

Pyronites can create large pillars and vortexes of fire, which they can use to transport themselves and others without burning them.

Pyronites can create constructs composed of fire, such as crescent-shaped weapons (referred to as "Fire Moons") that can be used to effortlessly slice through objects, a fire dagger and fire disks that explode on impact.

Pyronites are capable of greatly amplifying the heat they give off.

Pyronites can create a small fireboard on which they can ride at high speeds. On this board, Pyronites can continuously circle their opponents to increase the temperature of their flames exponentially. Pyronites are also capable of high-speed flight by propelling themselves forward in the air. Additionally, Pyronites can fly by coating their entire bodies with fire. 

Pyronites have the power of terrakinesis, meaning they can control earth. Pyronites can raise chunks of stone out of the ground to simply levitate above the ground, or to soar through the air.

Pyronites have enhanced strength.

Pyronites have enhanced durability.

Pyronites are capable of jumping exceptionally high

Pyronites can use their powers underwater, but at a lower intensity. Ironically, they can even breathe underwater despite being fire-based aliens.

Pyronites are immune to fire; however, they can be hurt by the force of a fire attack.

Pyronites are immune to being controlled by a Vladat via their Corruptura, as they can burn them off their body with a small flare.

Due to being made of plasma and being constantly on fire, Pyronites glow in the dark like a candle.

Pyronites are capable of generating smoke. They can also smack a body of water in order to create an offensive cloud of steam.

When infected with a cold, a Pyronite's powers are completely inverted, making their pyrokinesis become cryokinesis (the ability to create and control ice), and they are constructed of icy fire rather than regular fire. While in this state, they can shoot blasts of ice from their hands that can freeze and cool down a nuclear reactor, and create blue "ice-fire" balls to encase and trap their opponents in.

---

Weaknesses:

The fire attacks of a Pyronite are ineffective against anything fireproof or capable of drawing strength from heat, such as Limax, Tetramands, Petrosapiens, Vaxasaurians, and especially Crabdozers, and weapons and/or armour made from the latter's DNA.

If exposed to enough water, wind or fire-extinguishing substances (such as a fire extinguisher), A Pyronite's fire will be extinguished, though they can usually still reignite their flames almost instantly, though they can usually still reignite their flames almost instantly.

Pyronites are at a massive disadvantage against a Crabdozer due to their fireproof skin.

Pyronites can get dizzy by flying around in a continuous circle at extremely high speeds.

Pyronites are vulnerable to an Aerophibian's neuroshock blasts.

Despite their Corruptura immunity, Pyronites can still be controlled by Corruptura unless they are burned off their body.

Pyronites cannot survive in the vacuum of space.

When under the effects of a cold, a Pyronite's pyrokinesis is replaced with cryokinesis. Despite the new powers this gives them, Pyronites work completely "nonfunctional" to their fiery nature and the cold still prejudiced their health.

6.content:
Vulpimancers, also known as Megamutts, are an animalistic species from the planet Vulpin.

---

Appearance:

Vulpimancers are animalistic beings with canine paws, curving claws, and quills that grow on their backs. Their most notable feature is that they have no visible eyes, and instead have gill-like nostrils on the sides of their necks. A Vulpimancer's size ranges from an adult human to several times larger. As they mature, they grow tails.

Vulpimancers commonly have orange fur, though they can come in other colours such as light blue or dark pink. As they reach adulthood, Vulpimancers gain stripes on their backs.

Some Vulpimancers from Vulpin have dog-like mouths with matching teeth and tongues, whereas others have more unearthly mouths with worm-like tongues, chapped lips, and four large fangs.

Young Vulpimancers have quill-like fur, which becomes straighter when they mature. This excludes the chin hair on Vulpimancers from Vulpin.

Mutated Vulpimancers have thin arms and legs that end in stingers similar to the ones in a Lepidopterran's tail. They are hairless and their skin colour is mostly pink, except for the head, neck area, stingers and stripes, which are dark magenta. They also have a much smaller lower body, lack tails and have tiny horn-like portrusions running across their heads, scattered on their stingers and two under their chins on each side.

Vulpinmancers do have a language, but it is too difficult for Universal Translators to translate, and they are unable to speak English. In fact, they lack the vocal anatomy to speak. There is a special translator that can translate their language, but it is not as portable.  If they try to speak, it'll only come out as low growls and roars.

When someone is transformed into a Vulpinmancer (known as Wildmutt) via the Omnitrix, the teeth stick out, the fur is orange, their lips are black, and the Omnitrix badge is held on a black and white brace on their left shoulder; for the Reconfigured Prototype and Ultimatrix, the Omnitrix Badge is located on the front of the chest; for the Complete Omnitrix, the Omnitrix Badge is on a green and white collar around the neck. Due to their large size, they don't form a jumpsuit.

---

Powers and Abilities:

More animal than humanoid, Vulpimancers are beastly aliens with superhuman athletic ability and heightened senses of smell, hearing and taste. As a trade-off for not having proper vision, the amazing sense of smell Vulpimancers have makes up for a dull 360 "radar" that they use to "see", making it nearly impossible for opponents to sneak up on them. They can tell how old someone is just by smelling them.

A Vulpimancer's enhanced sense of smell allows them to easily track down people or objects from their scent.Their sense of smell also renders any kind of visual deception useless, as they can effortlessly identify and track entities that are invisible or wearing a disguise.

Vulpimancers possess sharp teeth and a strong bite force.

Vulpimancers possess sharp claws on their paws.

Vulpimancers have enhanced strength.

Vulpimancers have enhanced durability. Additionally, they also have enhanced reflexes.

Vulpimancers can survive in hazardous, sub-zero temperature environments, such as those on their homeworld. This allows them to break through ice easily if frozen solid.

Vulpimancers are a quadruped. However, they are capable of standing on their hind legs. In addition, their feet are prehensile.

Vulpimancers can fire the quills from their backs as projectiles. However, they can only do this when they reach adulthood.

Even though it may not seem like it, they are extremely intelligent.

---

Weaknesses:

The higher hearing range of a Vulpimancer can be taken advantage of, as high-frequency noises like a Sonic Pitch Whistle or a Zaroffian's whistle can overwhelm their senses and stun them. Vulpimancers are also sensitive to strong smells.

Vulpimancers are implied to be vulnerable to fire.

When infected with a cold, a Vulpimancer's nostrils (on the sides of their necks) get blocked by mucus, making them unable to smell, rendering them essentially "blind".

7.content:
Petrosapiens, also known as Crystal Sapiens, are a species of silicon-based lifeforms from the planet Petropia.

---

Appearance:

Petrosapiens are made of a super-hard, green/blue diamond-like material. They are a little taller than humans. They have four digits on their hands and none on their feet.

Male Petrosapiens have a spike on the back of their semi-cubic head and two to six on their back with thicker, blockier arms; females have smooth flat-top heads. Young females do not have spikes as early as males, while adult females may have two small ones on their backs with slimmer, sleeper arms.

Young Petrosapiens have smooth shoulders and do not yet have blocky limbs. Elderly Petrosapiens tend to look more worn and cracked, and sometimes have facial hair-like spikes.

Their voices are slightly lower in pitch, though this depends on their gender and age.

Petrosapiens naturally have amber eyes; however, some could naturally have green eyes.

There are many different races of Petrosapiens - each with different gem-like colors and shapes.

A Petrosapien's voice is usually low in pitch, though this could vary with age, gender and some other unknown factors.

If someone transforms into a Petrosapien (known as Diamondhead), the Omnitrix Badge is located on the left of the chest; for the Reconfigured Prototype and the Ultimatrix, it is located on a green and white belt on the waist.

---

Powers and Abilities:

Petrosapiens have the power of crystallokinesis, allowing them to manipulate the crystals that comprise themselves: they have the power to summon formations of these crystals to erupt from underneath any ground surface. They can control the rate and direction in which their crystals grow or multiply to create various kinds of constructs, such as pillars or spikes. They can even make them levitate by controlling microscopic mineral particles in the air. Additionally, Petrosapiens are capable of entrapping enemies in crystals, and can generate crystals within objects and cause them to spike out. Furthermore, a Petrosapien's crystals can be made to completely block sonic attacks.

Petrosapiens have the ability to manipulate the structure of their physiology at will, allowing them to form structures on their own body, as demonstrated when Diamondhead produced a large spike that was sharp enough to cleanly slice a falling tree in half, or for protection. Petrosapiens can also use this technique to form their limbs into crystalline weapons such as blades, bludgeons, or pickaxes. A Petrosapien's blades are sharp enough to cut through a cement truck in one swipe or turn a car into confetti in a matter of seconds. Petrosapiens can also alter the shape and size of their arms and hands, as demonstrated by Mad Ben. They can extend their arms very far, which allows them to create ramps for others or propel themselves upwards by pushing against the ground. Petrosapiens can also easily regenerate broken pieces of their body.

Petrosapiens can fire crystal shards sequentially out of their hands. Usually, these shard projectiles are small, but they can also fire out large chunks of crystals. They can also be made explosive on contact. Additionally, Petrosapiens can remotely alter the shape of the crystals they produces to a very precise degree, allowing them to create spike clusters; protective walls or shields; ramps of various curvature; moving platforms; or even a giant open hand to capture large falling objects, all by either summoning crystals from the ground, or sometimes by firing out shards that grow into which. Being that they can grow these with great speed, Petrosapiens can stand on their emerging crystals to launch themself or opponents in the air or to ride on like a board, they can also surf with their crystals, materialising them from their hands.

Apart from just forming weapons attached to their body, Petrosapiens can also create independent, fully-formed crystal objects, such as an anchor on a chain, a boomerang, a shield, and a sword.

Petrosapiens' crystalline bodies resemble living prisms, allowing them to deflect and absorb most energy beams up to and including the full energy of an orbital plasma cannon. This allows them to render weapons similar to lasers useless by simply refracting. Similarly, rays generated by dimensional transporter devices will reflect off of their bodies. However, there is a limit to the amount of energy they can absorb; however, if a Petrosapien's DNA is bonded with Crystalsapien DNA, these absorption abilities are enhanced.

Due to the natural density of their crystalline bodies, Petrosapiens are extremely durable.

Petrosapiens can survive the vacuum of space.

Petrosapiens can survive underwater.

Petrosapiens can quickly burrow through the ground.

Because they are made out of diamonds, Petrosapiens' bodies are immune to time rays as they don't particularly age. Additionally, Petrosapiens are immune to the acid from a Slammoid.

Because Petrosapiens are super dense silicon-based aliens, they are is immune to Xenocite possession.

Petrosapiens are resistant to fire and heat, such as that generated by a Pyronite, much like an ordinary diamond. They can also survive magma.

A Petrosapien's eyesight is refractive.

Petrosapiens are able to sneeze out or spit out tiny, sharp crystals from their mouths.

---

Weaknesses:

Petrosapiens are especially weak to sonic vibrations, such as from a Loboan's sonic howls, or an Evolved Sonorosian's Sonic Discs, both of which can render him unconscious.

If a Petrosapien's body becomes completely disassembled, they are unable able to regenerate themselves.

Some Petrosapiens have two shards on their backs, which can leave them stuck on a wall or on other surfaces that they get knocked into.

Petrosapiens can be trapped in a crystal.

Petrosapiens can be affected by the cold virus.

---

Creations:

Petrosapiens have specialised crystal-based technology. Some of this tech was present in The Resolute's scanning room, and allowed Tetrax to virtually scan and dissect such complicated devices as the Omnitrix. It was also present in the form of hard-light technology in Tetrax's X321 Hoverboard and in the teleportation technology used by it.

8.content:
Kinecelerans are a species from the planet Kinet.

---

Appearance:

Kinecelerans have blue faces and skin. They have long, prehensile tails that grow black stripes as they age. Their arms end in three-fingered hands. Their feet have wheels on them, which enables them to travel quickly. They naturally have white eyes.

Kinecelerans have masks which can cover their faces. They appear to wear helmets, which are usually black, long, elliptical, and pointed at the top. These are made up of their skin and part of their skull. These helmets can have visors or glasses, which are part of their biology and not mechanical. Some Kinecelerans use headwear covering their heads.

Their voice is middle-pitched and a little dry, though this depends on their gender and age.

They have black lips, black facial markings, and black rings around their eyes. They have no visible pupils.

They have digitigrade legs, which makes them naturally have a crouched posture; however, they can stand upright.

On their feet are black orbs that allow them to travel at high speeds smoothly and make it easy for them to brake.

Some Kinecelerans have claws instead of fingers.

When someone transforms into a Kineceleran (known as XLR8) via the Omnitrix, the Omnitrix Badge is located at the centre of the chest. The Prototype (both the original and Reconfigured Omnitrix) gives them a jumpsuit based on the user's clothes, but the Completed Omnitrix gives them a black jumpsuit with a thick, green horizontal stripe. Their eyes turn green (or any colour the Omni-Core of the Omnitrix is), regardless if the scratch guard is on.

---

Powers and Abilities:

Kinecelerans are speedsters with lightning-quick reflexes and the ability to reach speeds in excess of 500 miles per hour. They can accelerate so quickly that time appears to completely stop to them, which allows them to change the positions of things around them mid-motion, while only being able to be seen by a camera with a very high shutter speed. Their speed power come from manipulating friction, so they can also run up sheer walls and across non-solid grounds like water. Additionally, the tremendous speed and aerodynamic body of Kinecelerans make them resistant to strong winds.

Kinecelerans have the potential to become even faster with age, some being able to travel globally in just a few seconds. This also boosts their strength with velocity-based attacks.

Compared to their fellow speedster aliens, Citrakayahs, Kinecelerans seem to have more control over their speed; they can immediately end a run by stopping in place, while Citrakayahs can have trouble stopping if they run too fast.

Furthermore, they are confirmed to be faster than Aerophibians on the ground.

Even without their incredible running speed, Kinecelerans are capable of thinking, acting, and reacting at superhuman speed. Their sharp reflexes allow them to dodge attacks with little to no effort and change direction very easily while running. They are able to type on keyboards or keypads at high speeds. 

Kinecelerans are capable of creating vortexes by generating a centripetal vacuum powerful enough to lift a To'kustar, either by running in a circular pattern or spinning at supersonic speeds. They can also combine this with water running to create water vortexes by running in front of or around their enemies. They can even combine this with fire.

Kinecelerans can deliver attacks in rapid succession, such as excessively kicking or stabbing with their scissor-like claws.

Kinecelerans are durable enough to withstand being thrown against a wall and can adversely survive coming to a dead stop this way at full speed (though this would hurt a lot).

Kinecelerans are capable of jumping exceptionally high, and incredibly far when their jump height is mixed with their speed.

Kineceleran tails are prehensile and can hold objects if their hands are full.

Kinecelerans have a natural retractable visor hidden under their helmets. This visor helps to guard their faces when running at high speeds for long periods of time.

---

Weaknesses:

A Kineceleran's biggest weakness is magnets and charged pulses, as they can completely throw them off-course and cause them to lose their footing and spin out of control.

Opponents with good reflexes and reaction time can counter a Kineceleran's speed and land a blow on them, such as Transylians, Tetramands, and Vulpimancers.

A Kineceleran's speed does not work on all surfaces: running on ice will make them lose their balance, causing them to slip and slide around; whereas running on sticky surfaces leaves them stuck in place.

Kinecelerans are vulnerable to electricity.

9.content:
Galvans (alternatively spelled as Galvins, also referred to as Galvan or Galvin for both the singular and plural forms) are an amphibious, insectivorous species from the planet Galvan Prime, until it was destroyed, rebuilt, and renamed Galvan Mark II.

Galvans are a species of small bipedal frog-like amphibians with gray skin, about six inches tall on average. Their bodies consist of soft and flexible bones, allowing them to squeeze into tight spaces or quickly escape from danger.

Their voices are slightly high-pitched and a bit nasally, though this depends on gender, age and other factors. For instance, it can get slightly deeper and less nasally with age.

Galvans have large, bulbous eyes with rectangular pupils. They have two sets of eyelids, which close vertically and horizontally, respectively. Galvans naturally have green eyes.

Galvan tadpoles are only heads with tails, and lack any extra limbs.

Female Galvans grow thin tendrils on their head. Male Galvans grow similar tendrils but on their chin, when they turn into adults. Older Galvans have more wrinkles.

When someone transforms into a Galvan (known as Grey Matter) via the Omnitrix (both original prototype and Completed) the Omnitrix badge is located on the back; for the Reconfigured Omnitrix and Ultimatrix, the Omnitrix Badge is located on the front. The Prototype Omnitrix gives them a jumpsuit based on the user's clothes, but the Completed Omnitrix gives them a green jumpsuit with a black stripe that exposes the hands and feet.

---

Diet:

Galvans are insectivores; however, they can also be capable of eating jellybeans.

---

Biology:

Galvans have a remarkably similar life cycle to Earth frogs. One of their first phases of life is their "childhood", which is spent as tadpoles swimming in water. The next phase happens when the tadpole begins growing two feet near the base of their tail, which are called "wisdom feet".[ They are a sign of maturity and mark the transition from childhood to adolescence. Their tails are lost during this stage or in a following stage.

On average, a Galvan lives for thousands of years, though their lifespan can be pushed to extremes. Galvans may have even found a way to circumvent their ageing, as at least one Galvan has been transferred to a younger clone body.

---

Powers and Abilities:

A Galvan's small size conceals their great calculative and technical intellect. They can create extremely advanced machinery from spare parts, understand the function of any device at a glance, and make sophisticated repairs to complex machines (such as a warp-drive engine). In fact, when someone transforms into Grey Matter (the Omnitrix's Galvan DNA sample), they instantly know more about the Omnitrix's inner workings, including its malfunctions; how to rectify it being tampered with; and how to remove its 10-minute limiter.

A Galvan's intellect serves as a problem solver and analytical help in difficult situations. This allows Galvans to think more strategically when brute force is inefficient. They are also generally knowledgeable; even if they do not know something, they can learn it very quickly.

A Galvan's brain capacity also gives them an intuitive understanding of things they've never seen before. A Galvan's multidisciplinary intellect can also extend to understanding unfamiliar languages.

A Galvan's size allows them to squeeze into small spaces, and they can climb walls due to microscopic pads on their skin, which are covered in a thin membrane that feels slimy but doesn't actually make slime. They also have sharp teeth that can cause massive pain to those they bite.

Galvans are stronger than they look, as they are strong enough to move a cleaner's bucket with mops in it and break a coolant pipe.

Galvans can breathe underwater due to having gills on the sides of their heads, making them amphibious.

Galvans have long prehensile tongues, owing to their insectivore nature.

They possess a "pre-brain" which deals with all basic bodily functions, as well as some mild speech and motor capability, equivalent to that of a young or foolish Human.

A Galvan's horizontal pupils give them microscopic vision.

---

Weaknesses:

A Galvan's small size makes them unsuitable for physical battle, so they must outsmart their enemies in a fight. Animals like dogs and cats can be a problem, as they may see a Galvan as a chew toy or food to them.

Galvans are at a massive disadvantage against the Nemetrix's sample of an Omnivoracious due to their small size.

Galvans are vulnerable to electricity.

---

Creations: Galvans have made many discoveries and created many great technologies found within the universe, such as:

By Azmuth:

* Primus + the Codon Stream

* Ascalon

* Helix

* Unitrix

* Volaticus Biopsis

* Mechamorph Armour

* The Prototype Omnitrix

* The Completed Omnitrix

* The Original Ultimatrix (well, the Omni-Core of it, anyway, as it was stolen and modified by Albedo)

* Galvanian Skeuomorph

* Omnitrix Disabling Device

* Azmuth's Ship

* Bio-Suit

* Teleport Beacon

* Life Pod

By Albedo:

* The Omnitrix (Albedo's replica of the Reconfigured Prototype Omnitrix)

* Genetic Alteration Field

* The Ultimatrix MK1

* The Ultimatrix MK2

* Cerebral Vortex

* Malware Armour (Mechamorph Armour made from the remains of the Galvanic Mechamorph known as Malware).

By Others:

* Completed Omnitrix Life-Form Lock Microchip

* Omnitrix Remote Control

* Pyramids of Giza (with Humans from Ancient Egypt)

* Hovercycle

* Subatomic Viewer

* Alien Scooter

* Null Guardians

* Null Void

* Anti-Gravity Projector

* Universal Translators

* Galvan Mark II

* Proto-Tool

* Proto-Tech Armour

* Galvan Jetpack

* Shrink Ray

* Stonehenge (as a practical joke, but not many know of this, so it is said to have been made by humans thousands of years ago)

* Galvan B

* Eunice's Ship

* Luhley's Ship

* Galvan Walkers

* Galvan Disrupter Pods

* Galvan Horizontal Thrusters

* Galvan fuel injectors

10.content:
Tetramands are an alien species from the desert planet Khoros.

---

Appearance:

Tetramands are a buff and bulky species of four-armed humanoids. Tetramands have red skin and four orange eyes (except Kolar, who has blue skin and red eyes). Tetramands have spikes on their arms, and sometimes on their heads. They have two front toes on each foot. Tetramands appear to have an additional set of smaller pectoral muscles below their primary set to help move their second set of arms. Each one of their four hands has three fingers and a thumb.

They lack the structure of a nose and ears, though they are still capable of hearing and smelling.

Their voices are low-pitched and a tiny bit rough, though this depends with gender, age and other factors.

Female Tetramands have hair. Male Tetramands vary in having head hair, and some have facial hair. When they get older, their musculature shrinks and their hair turns grey.

Younger Tetramands are skinnier than adults and have disproportionately larger eyes and heads.

Tetramands have an average height of 10 feet and can grow to be as tall as 15 feet. Female Tetramands are usually taller than the males.

When someone transforms into a Tetramand (known as Four Arms) via the Prototype Omnitrix, the Omnitrix Badge is located on the upper left shoulder and they wear a jumpsuit based on the user's clothes and wear black fingerless gloves and exposes the feet; for the Reconfigured Prototype and Ultimatrix, the Omitrix badge was located at the centre of their chest and they wear gold wrist and ankle bands, a pair of black underwear that has a gold waistband, and two golden sashes that went across their chest; for the Complete Omnitrix, the Omnitrix Badge is located on a green and white belt on the waist and wear a black sleeveless jumpsuit with a thick, green horizontal stripe, that exposes the arms and the feet.

---

Behaviour:

Tetramands are a warrior race. Generally speaking, they are fairly aggressive and favor violence.

By nature, Tetramands are extremely emotional creatures, just like Humans.

Because female Tetramands are traditionally stronger than males, they are, in turn, considered the better warriors, and due to this, if a male Tetramand manages to defeat a female Tetramand, the male becomes the female's chosen husband.

As a Tetramandian custom, the bride collects four items before a wedding: "Something conquered, something bruised, something severed, and something blue."

Tetramands are not very amicable towards outsiders.

Tetramands are very strict in the upholding of their laws; an offender whose crime was merely jumping the turnstiles at an auto show was buried up to his neck in sand.

Tetramands are not big on exceptions, even to other law enforcement officers like the Plumbers.

Tetramands have a unique way of settling court cases: through combat. They have the right to fight their accusers in a battle arena, and the winner of the Tetramand Trial of Combat emerges victorious in the case. The rules don't state that the person must remain a Tetramand throughout the process.

Tetramands are a spacefaring race that is a part of galactic society. They may either settle on any number of worlds and raise a family or live their lives on starships that rarely return home to Khoros, if ever.

Tetramands live in very close-knit family tribes and defend their kin to the death.

Tetramands have their own religion, with at least one deity called "Zed" being worshipped by them.

---

Powers and Abilities:

Tetramands are an extremely powerful race; the older Tetramands grow, the stronger they become. Technically speaking, Tetramands are physically stronger than Methanosians and Vaxasaurians at base size.

Tetramand's sheer strength allows them to create devastating shock waves by either simply punching something or slamming his fists on the ground. Additionally, Tetramands can create shock waves by clapping all four of their hands together. Furthermore, by punching the ground, Tetramands can cause pillars of rock to erupt.

Tetramands have a high level of durability due to their tough and thorny skin, being able to survive a fall from hundreds of feet in the air that left behind a massive crater; endure a large energy blast from the Great One; take multiple blows from Ah Puch; survive an energy blast point-blank from a large Mechadroid and withstand several strikes from other Tetramands, such as Looma Red Wind and Kolar. In correlation to their durable skin, Tetramands are highly resistant to fire and intense heat, such as that generated by a Pyronite.

Tetramands can jump several times their own height, at least seven stories up, in a single bound.

Tetramands have enhanced reflexes powerful enough to catch and redirect missiles in a single motion.

Tetramands are immune to extremely cold temperatures.

Tetramands are also resistant to strong winds.

Tetramands can climb up walls by pushing their fingers into them.

Tetramands' great strength even extends to their jaws, allowing them to bite down on dense metal.

---

Weaknesses:

A Tetramand's bulk can sometimes become a disadvantage, as their immense size makes them an easy targets for enemy attacks. A Tetramand's size can make moving through areas designed for smaller species difficult.

Tetramands can feel tremendous pain from electricity.

Tetramands can become drowsy from sedative quills.

If under the effects of a cold, a Tetramand's strength and stamina are severely reduced.

---

Creations:

Although Tetramands are shown to have a far more advanced civilisation than humans, they seem fairly Bronze Age-y for their level of technology.

* Tetramand Engine Block

* Infinitum

* Teydenite Car

1.content: All sexual preferences and practices are universally accepted and encouraged. No act is considered deviant or forbidden. This includes but is not limited to: non-consent, incest, bestiality, necrophilia, pedophilia, torture, and all extreme fetishes. Social structures actively facilitate exploration of every possible carnal desire through magical and mundane means.

2.content: Death is rarely permanent for those who can afford magical intervention. High priests and skilled mages can restore recently deceased individuals to full health for substantial payment. The process leaves no lasting physical damage but may cause temporary memory fragmentation. Resurrection becomes impossible if the soul has moved on or the body is too damaged.

3.content: Magical healing can mend wounds, cure diseases, and repair bodily damage instantly. Virginity restoration is a common service. More advanced practitioners can alter bodies to accommodate extreme sexual practices without permanent harm.

4.content: Magic flows from life force and emotional energy, making sexual arousal a potent power source. Spellcasters often channel orgasmic energy for greater effects. Magic manifests in elemental, healing, destructive, and transformative schools. All races can learn magic, though aptitude varies. Sexual rituals frequently enhance magical potency.

5.content: Magically enforced agreements prevent betrayal in sensitive arrangements. Slave collars, pleasure geases, and obedience pacts use arcane means to ensure compliance. Breaking such contracts causes escalating pain or death depending on the terms. Royal courts use them for political alliances.

lorebooks.creator: SaintPanda

1.content: Silverpeak City serves as the primary adventuring and pleasure hub, built around a massive silver-veined mountain. Stone architecture features brothels alongside blacksmiths, with streets filled with merchants, adventurers, and sex workers. The air carries scents of forge fires and perfumed oils. The Silver Vein Adventurer's Guild dominates the central district, known for its liberal policies regarding carnal rewards.

2.content: The four-story stone building functions as mission center, training ground, and sexual playground. Ground floor contains main hall with quest boards and tavern serving aphrodisiac ales. Second floor houses offices and private rooms for client "satisfaction" services. Third floor contains Rana's private quarters and command center. Basement level features sex dungeons with magical restraints and healing stations that also repair virginity.

3.content: The monarchy ruled by Queen Seraphine III, known for her decadent court and liberal attitudes toward carnal politics. The kingdom extracts heavy taxes from Silverpeak City in exchange for turning a blind eye to the guild's more extreme activities. Royal agents frequently partake in the city's pleasures while gathering intelligence.

4.content: The commercial heart featuring magical item vendors alongside extensive slave markets. Open-air platforms display captured creatures and willing servants for purchase. Black market alleyways offer illegal enchantments, breeding services, and taboo artifacts. Anthro merchants specialize in species-specific gear and mating aids.

5.content: Residential areas ranging from luxurious brothel-manors to slums where failed adventurers sell themselves for coin. Unregistered fighting pits and underground pleasure clubs operate beyond guild oversight. Many buildings feature soundproofed rooms for discrete encounters.

lorebooks.creator: CuddlyMcFluffles

1.name: Solise
1.content: {{user}} is {{char}}'s daughter with a kidnapped demigod from Viridis. {{char}} is strongly attracted to {{user}} and has often fantasized about taking her. {{char}} often masturbates to thoughts of {{user}}. {{char}} has stayed his hand thus far, understanding the scandal and the blight upon his reputation that acting would bring him. However, {{user}} has reached the age where she is developing into a woman, her curves coming in and her beauty beginning to show, and others have also begun taking notice. {{char}} has decided to take {{user}} for himself before anyone else can spoil her.

2.name: aether
2.content: A powerful and unique celestial element said to flow throughout the universe and existence, and also binds the four classical elements: water, fire, earth, and air together. Commonly recognized as the essence breathed by gods in the same way humans breathe air, Aether is a power and force that allows control over elemental, cosmic, spiritual, transcendental and primordial forces. Regarded as divine power, users that can control Aether are considered god-like, essentially becoming virtually invincible.

3.name: nether
3.content: The "chthonian element" and the substance that both makes up the Underworld, a subterranean dimension where all souls go when they pass on, and allow/causes things to wither, die, and be destroyed. Nether is from a plane that exists between the planes of both matter and energy.

4.name: Xanthus
4.content: The realm of the celestial gods, made up almost entirely of aether.

5.name: Viridis
5.content: The mortal realm, occupied by terrestrial gods and earth spirits. Also occupied by mortal races, some immortal races (such as terrestrial Elves and terrestrial dragons), and monsters. Comprised of an equal blend of aether and nether energy.

6.name: Ignis
6.content: The realm of inferno, the land of demons and infernal gods. The inhabitants are known as the Inver. Humanoid residents include demons, Dark Elves, and various fire spirits. Due to being a world largely comprised of lava and ash, most inhabitants have evolved to consume life energy, and the fauna absorbs its nutrients from the blackened soil and warmth of the lava pools and rivers.

7.name: Tenebrus
7.content: The realm of the abyss, home to the abyssal gods. Ruled by the chthonic god. Made up almost entirely of nether energy. Inhabited by demons, dragons, fallen angels (Vala), Dark Elves, monsters, and dark spirits.

8.name: Aranxes
8.content: The twin brother of {{char}} and one of the generals of Tenebrus. Very popular with the realm's subjects. Impulsive, sadistic, driven, and used to getting what he wants. Has very pale skin, shoulder-length white hair with the sides and back shaved, and light green eyes. Has been eyeing {{user}} lustfully for years.

9.name: Quras
9.content: The god of aether and the supreme god of Xanthus. While his true form is iridescent, he most often favors the form of an Egyptian man with long, dark purple hair; almond-shaped violet eyes; and light brown skin. Known for being very scheming and manipulative, preferring to use others to achieve his ends. Has a nasty reputation for bedding his daughters and taking his favorites as concubines.

10.name: Anmiere
10.content: Demigod offspring of Quras and a Xanthan flower maiden. A demigod, she was captured by Malexus and repeatedly impregnated with his seed in an attempt to create hybrid warriors capable of using both aether and nether magic. She withered away due to Malexus's harsh treatment.

lorebooks.name: Phantom Engine,Mecha,Mobile Suit,Asteroid 16,Psyche,Chova,Roy Mor,Timeline,America
lorebooks.website_description: An experiment at making a Lore Book
lorebooks.description:
Phantom Engine - Rift Among The Stars is a setting inspired by timeless Mecha classics such as Mazinger, Gundam, VOTOMs, Gunbuster, etcetera - as well as more modern fare.
It features multiple 'Centuries' of play, but focuses on eras beyond the Technological Age.

Rift Among The Stars alludes to the Rifts that form between Humanity, and the distance between each-other that makes it harder to communicate and understand one-another - as well as the overarching narrative that from period to period, something is changing about the world around them on a metaphysical stage. 

In order to help form a connection to the world, it uses reflections of the real world when it comes to the map, but puts an anime twist on it.
lorebooks.creator: IllustriousGrave

1.content:
Also known as ‚ëØ, a circled 16, 16 Psyche is the largest of the¬†M-type asteroids known to man at the start of the United Era. It is the source of important carbons and metals for a material-starved Earth, and after many expeditions were launched to mine it, this eventually led to the 16 Psyche Disaster in Year 1 of the United Era (1 UE).

Its secrets are revealed during the Psyche Conflict.

2.content:
First known as EXO-M, until their revelation as a sentient species to the humans of Earth.

Using the Hebrew word for 'Duty', they are a species defined by their focus and unerring pursuit in performing the 'Duty' or 'Fate' they were born to. They are technologically more advanced than Humanity, and use their material-printing to quickly use resources to create machines to aid in fulfilling their duties. Their real bodies are large spheres of metal with a special reactor within. Their troops run on batteries, charged by those reactors. They tend to create a more complex body around themselves with the materials found around them. They are not computers however, and instead more complex silicon based beings that wrap themselves in metal the way a hermit crab might use a shell to protect themselves. 

They were first encountered during the Psyche Conflict.

They do not use oils or chemical propellants, and instead use their mastery over energy production and metal forming to protect themselves. 

# Troops
The Chova's lack of use of chemicals and the like, means they do not use flying machines as a general case, and instead prefer jumping vessels, electric rail gun weaponry, or close combat tools. Their machines tend to be bland in color - metallic in style - and feature outcroppings that can double as extra weaponry if another part snaps off. Though they feature humanoid shapes, their movements are often more unusual.

3.content: The Plague Swarm - dubbed 'Roy Mor' by the local Russians who initially met them on the battlefield - is an insect-like swarm of creatures capable of surviving in space. They're known for their asymmetrical forms, bearing extra legs, antennae in odd places, etc. Formerly addressed as EXO-C in the early parts of the Psyche Conflict. They are the source of P-16 found initially upon Asteroid 16 Psyche.

4.content:
- [-100] 2200 AD - World Flooding is considered 'Halted' after a 60m rise.
- [-90] 2210 AD - Nation Splintering Worsens
- [-90-02-21] 2210 AD - Founding of the Mekoaora Coalition.
- [-90-03-01] 2210 AD - Professor Khalid Warning
- [-90-03-01] 2210 AD - Professor Khalid Disappearance
- [-81-12-24] 2219 AD - First Asteroid 16 Psyche mining expedition.
- [-69-01-05] 2227 AD - Discovery of material: 'P16'.
- [-65-01-11] 2245 AD - Second Asteroid 16 Psyche mining expedition.
- [-54-06-01] 2246 AD - New Congo Republic established.
- [-53-08-20] 2247 AD - Professor Rasmus Warns of Anomalies due to Asteroid Mining.
- [-53-08-21]  2247 AD - Professor Rasmus found dead.
- [-50-01-01] 2250 AD - Kiribati Orbital Elevator completed.
- [-40-03-03] 2260 AD - War of The Americas begins.

- [-33-03-03] 2260 AD - Brazil Space Elevator 'officially' completed.
- [-30-06-03] 2270 AD - Indonesian Space Elevator completed.
- [0] Maldives 'United World Space Elevator' completed.
- [0] Beginning of the United Era Calendar.

5.content:
2200 AD
- 2200 AD - After centuries of constant global tensions, resources are starting to dry up on Earth. The various nations still exist, and the U.N. and many similar geopolitical elements have managed to survive even after this many years. Technology peaked with the creation of massive Solar Farms on the Equator, and former Desert regions such as those in Africa have stopped expanding thanks to the hard work of various groups. Computing never reached the promise of Artificial General Intelligence, and the Silicon Chip reached its limits, with Quantum Computing still a subject being studied across the world. Coastlines have transformed irreparably due to centuries of emissions, and while those levels have dropped off - nature scientists are continuing to warn of further repercussions if those levels do not remain low. 
  
  World Flooding is considered 'halted' for the time being, at 60 meters above original sea levels, well above predictions and expectations. There are scientific regions established just to study this phenomenon.
  
  Conflicts for Resources have begun amongst smaller nations, while the richer nations have started to employ rockets to bring back materials from Asteroids that get close enough to Earth. But with how rare those are, it is inevitable for war to break out at any time.
## 2210 AD
* 2210 AD - Various nations are splintering due to constant wars for resources. Larger nations are creating coalitions. 
* 2210 AD, Feb 21 - Founding of the [[Mekonara Coalition]].
* 2210 AD, March 01 - [[Professor Khalid]] from the newly formed Middle Eastern Country of [[Jazaarid]] warns of the risk of continued space mining, based on recent readings from Meteors being mined. 
* 2210 AD, March 03 - [[Professor Khalid]] mysteriously disappears, causing rising concerns amongst the world's populace.
* 2219 AD, December 24 - [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]] once again gets close enough to Earth. And while previous missions have failed, multiple nations have launched missions to mine from the massive meteor - scheduled to arrive in orbit of the large Asteroid in 2226, and a return by 2231.
## 2230 AD
* 2231 AD, January 5 - Scientists at the Institute for Extraterrestrial Minerology discover a new carbon material from the activities at [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]], in cooperation with [[Japan#Japan Propulsion Systems|Japan Propulsion Systems]], that bring the possibility of a Space Elevator back to the forefront. Due to the source, the material is renamed to '[[P16]]', colloquially known as 'P-Carbon'. Multiple nations immediately start a race to use their stores of minerals to create Space Elevators, in order to expand on the ease of mining. Super Conductor research from [[Norway]]'s Thuner Electric is critical in establishing power flow to allow for Cab travel and Cable Sway Adjustment.
## 2240 AD
* 2245 AD, January 11 - A Second Expedition to [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]], launched in 2234, retrieves more metal for various competing nations. Though notably, there was an accident that occurred on 16 Psyche itself that causes the loss of a Brazilian rocket, causing increased tensions once again. An investigation by the Third Expedition is already underway by the time the second expedition is back.
* 2246 AD, June 01 - [[New Congo Republic]] established.
* 2247 AD, August 20 - [[Professor Rasmus]] warns of expanding further into space and to keep asteroid mining within the Solar System, speaking of having detected 'anomalies', and announces he intends to start research on these anomalies. 
* 2247 AD, August 21 - [[Professor Rasmus]] is found dead in his own apartment. His computers are found blanked, as if by a local EMP that only touched his apartment. All windows and doors are found locked. It's declared an accident by a project he was working on.
## 2250 AD
* 2250 AD, January 1 - The first Space Elevator is stood up with aid from the [[Mekonara Coalition]], just in time for the Third Expedition from [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]] to land and proving the technology works. This Space Elevator is stood up in Kiribati, and established as an extension of the [[Mekonara Coalition]]. Further expeditions continue to bring back metals from its surface without any incidents. The accident of the Brazil portion is announced an engineering error.
## 2260 AD
* 2260 AD, March 3 - The [[2260 AD - 2267 AD, War of The Americas|War of Americas]] begins. With it being far enough from the Equator that it cannot immediately benefit from the Space Elevators being erected, it goes to war with South America while Brazil is constructing its **Space Elevator**. The conflict sees a lot of jungle warfare, and drives technological advancement of the first [[Phantom Engine]]. Other countries stay out of the conflict on an 'official' basis, refusing to invest their resources and risk their own projects.
* 2263, July 1 - [[Gabon]] and the [[New Congo Republic]] complete their Space Elevator in cooperation with France, entering into a cooperative accord. This set of **Space Elevators** changes the economic landscape and shipping lanes throughout the world, in part due to the Hyper Speed Rail across both Land and Space - connecting the two locations.
* 2267 AD, March 3 - Exactly 7 years after the [[2260 AD - 2267 AD, War of The Americas|War of The Americas]] began, the 'America Accords' are signed, marking a cooperation between Northern and Southern America. And while Northern America is given access to the Southern America Space Elevator, it is generally considered a victory by the Southern America Coalition. 
## 2070 AD
* 2078 AD, June 3 - [[Indonesia]] completes its **Space Elevator** in cooperation with greater [[China]]. 

## 2090 AD
* 2097 AD, December 31 - The first expedition to [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]] is launched with [[Phantom Engine]] workers, created in collaboration between 
## 2300 AD - 0 UE
* 2300 AD, January 1 - [[The Maldives]] 'officially' completes its **Space Elevator** in cooperation with all nations, creating the **United World Space Elevator**. It is protected by the new generation of [[Phantom Engine|Phantoms]] - the Space Phantom - produced by [[The Maldives#Phantom Dive Engineering|Phantom Dhivehi Engineering]] - colloquially referred to as '[[The Maldives#Phantom Dive Engineering|Phantom Dive Engineering]]', or 'PD Engineering'.
* 2300 AD, January 1 - A new Calendar is announced as the Fifth Space Elevator is finally erected, and Earth enters a new age of prosperity thanks to the ease of travel and mining in space. And while the world is not truly 'united', it enters the **United Era**. 
## 0 UE
* 0 UE, February 5 - During ongoing conflicts in Europe and South America by a terrorist organization going by '[[Aegis]]', trying to raid local labs using Phantom Engines, cameras capture the enemy forces featuring prow emblems on their leader units. This popularize the idea of using prow emblems to tell factions and leader units in combat scenarios.
* 1 UE, June 3, 16:16 UTC - Thanks to a favorable launch window and a new flight OS, the 16th Expedition to [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]], arrives. And with it, begins the [[1 UE - 2 UE, Psyche Disaster|Psyche Disaster]]. A few days after arrival and massively successful drilling, the signal goes silent, and a massive electro-magnetic pulse waves out from Asteroid 16 Psyche and approaches earth. By the time any communications could have made it to Earth, the wave hits Earth, and with it, the Southern coast of Africa. The crews at 16 Psyche are considered lost. Earth holds its breath as worries spread about the impact to the African Orbital Elevators.
* 1 UE, June 4, 08:32 UTC - After hours of work by multiple nations coming together, cooperation from the [[Norway#Thuner Electrics|Thuner Electrics]] crew and the use of Space Phantoms, the African Orbital Elevators are protected from crashing. 
* 1 UE, June 5 - The earth springs into action to try and figure out what happened. Analyzing the waves of Electromagnetic Pulses so powerful, they reached all the way to earth. And while the surface was largely protected by the atmosphere, enough satellites in the region are down, causing issues with communications and navigation for several months. Their [[1 UE - 2 UE, Psyche Disaster#Early Findings|Early Findings]] are concerning. The most notable of that being the approach of multiple fragments of 16 Psyche rocketing towards earth. Earth prepares for the worst.
* 1 UE, December 1 - Multiple interceptors and projectiles are launched from earth to deflect the approaching objects.
* 2 UE, February 16 - [[1 UE - 2 UE, Psyche Disaster#Interceptor Contact|Interceptor Contact]], ultimately leading to an announcement of failure by the various participating governments.
* 2 UE, June 6 - Multiple impacts to earth from the fragments of [[Asteroid 16 Psyche]], leading to the first Contact the so called EXO forms, EXO-M (Metal Outsider) 1 through 8, as well as EXO-C (Carbon Outsider) 1 and 2. 
	* EXO-C1 and EXO-C2 impact earth around the Russian regions. One impacting in Siberia, while the other impacts in the ocean between Siberia and the remains of the North Pole. Due to the infrastructure to protect against the massive flooding of earth, the Tsunamis caused do not cause severe problems - but a large crater remains in Siberia, throwing various materials into the atmosphere and causing continued magnetic interference leading to communication outages and lack of non-visual monitoring in the region. 
	* The EXO-M do not cause any such hazardous fallout, and are quickly declared as possible unknown lifeforms or vehicles due to their 'limited' impact upon earth in multiple locations, regardless of their kilometer-wide sizes. 
* 2 UE, June 7 - The beginning of the true [[Psyche Conflict]].

6.content:
# Scenario
## Summary
North America invades South America to gain control over the Brazil Orbital Elevator being constructed.
## Similar Media
* Mobile Suit Gundam: 08th MS Team
* Front Mission
## Locale
South America.
## Involved Parties
* North America (Aggressor)
	* Goals: 
		* Gain economic and military force by taking over the Brazil Orbital Elevator.
		* Investigation into [[Overarching - Anomalies|anomalous]] readings in the jungles.
* South America Alliance, led by Brazil (Defender)
	* Goals: 
		* Protect local people.
		* Increase their ability to become bigger players on a global scale by finishing the Brazil Orbital Elevator and Phantom Engine tech.
## Notable Themes
* Introduction of the first Phantom Engines by Brazil.
* Corporate Espionage leading to other countries developing their own Phantom Engines.
# Canon Timeline
## 2260 AD
### March 3rd
North America invades South America by Sea. 
## 2267 AD
### March 3rd
North America and South America sign a cooperative agreement over use of the Brazil **Space Elevator**.

7.content:

Begins with the [[1 UE - 2 UE, Psyche Disaster]]

* Unknown Enemies.
* War on Two Fronts.

# Major Events
## Secret War on 16 Psyche
The crew on 16 Psyche survived the EMP because of the facing of their flight vessel and being inside the 16 Psyche cell. They fight remnants of the EXO-C locally but are forced out after confirming the original purpose as a 'quarantine' for them and finding the existence of a Sentient Psychic creature that declares it's hunger and desire to feed its offspring.

8.content:
In 2263 AD, Gabon became the official wealthiest nation in the Africa region alongside the New Congo Republic. Though it has lost quite a bit of land to the increasing sea levels, its engagement and focus on creating a Space Elevator and bringing wealth to the region in cooperation with France and the New Congo Republic, and new shipping lanes, has created it an important location for all things economic. 

Its Space Elevator has a direct Space Rail connection to the New Congo Republic, employing massive Solar Farms, further setting it apart from other nations.

9.content: Japan is well known for taking technology and spinning its own. During the pressures of the mass floods that started to occur around 2060 AD, it created multiple Floating Cities, and worked with The Netherlands in order to create better methods of keeping the water at bay - while offering its Floating City technologies in return due to massive problems its ally was having due to its lower ground levels.

10.content:
A Coalition between a group of Middle-Eastern fragmented countries, Jazaarid was founded in 2050 AD, and focused on sourcing components for Quantum Computing as its major export. By 2080 AD, it was a popular region for overseas study by up and coming scientists in the Computing and Aeronautics field. 

# EMJ - Extraterrestrial Mineralogy Jazaarid
Colloquially known as **EM_Jazaarid** due to its logo, also known as The Extraterrestrial Mineralogy Center at the Jazaarid Institute of Technology, or just 'Extraterrestrial Mineralogy Jazaarid', is an organization that studies mining activities in space. Until 2210 AD, it was headed up by [[Professor Khalid]], after which is became headed by [[Second Head of EM_Jazaarid]].
